data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I strongly believe Perl will be the first language to become
    sentient. In fact, I can easily see the perl5 regex engine sending
    Terminators into the distant past. My hope is that this module will
    be merciful to me when it takes over the world.

    The proposed module consists of a single class method:

    AI::General::dwim()

    Implementation will be left as an exercise for other developers
